OurPaths

OurPaths is a community that shares the experience of loss and brings people together to support each other. It is a place to remember and share precious memories, and to commemorate the ones we have loved and lost. Our members believe that no one should have to grieve alone.






Explore the program

The OurPaths application can run on multiple devices â€“ on the Web, on iPads and tablets, on your phone. It enables you to share with friends and communicate important information. OurPaths is also a place where you can find information including advice on practicalities, wisdom from hundreds of philosophers and writers, and join a forum with others who have experienced grief and loss.






Celebrate lives together

To remember our loved ones is to celebrate the life they lived. Share stories, words, photos and videos in our Timeline, Gallery and Story book. These stories will stay on our site forever. These are OurPaths.





Collaborate with friends & family

Community is invaluable when dealing with the loss of a loved one, a close friend, or someone you admire. OurPaths allows you to connect with people everywhere that share your experience of loss. No matter your location, OurPaths lets you share, sympathize, discuss and touch the lives of others with similar experiences.





Remember & heal through sharing

A true portrait of an individual is created when all who loved that person contribute. Invite your friends and family via Facebook, Twitter or email and let them share their thoughts and memories. Connect with your community and share support for each other.
